basics.name: Kevin R. Zhang
basics.label: Web Developer
basics.summary: Experienced Frond End Engineer with demonstrated history in software development. Skilled in designing user friendly web applications and implementing with cutting edge front end frameworks and tools. Strong engineering professional with a Bachelor of Science (B.Sc.) focused in Computer Engineering from University of British Columnbia.

work.summary: Design and craft front end applications with various of modern js frameworks
highlights: Designed and implemented the infrastructure(JavaScript) of the front-end project
Introduced cutting edge front-end concepts and tools to the team
Worked with graphic designer to bring best user experience to the product

work.summary: Create properly built web and mobile applications that users love.
highlights: Built highly interactive front-end components for both mobile and web platforms
Explored new technologies and techniques to improve the product and team
Planned how we bring our designs to life, and participated in daily scrums

work.summary: Maintain database records and legacy websites, design and develop functional websites with great user experience.
highlights: Design and develop project control panel for automagical calling system, that is widely used by clients and internal staff
Migrated multiple legacy websites from PHP4 to PHP5
Detected security loopholes in legacy websites and removed them
